sentences.sContent: We crawled into bed at 2 am.
sentences.sCn: 我们凌晨两点爬上了床。

synos.tran: 爬行；[水产]养鱼池；匍匐而行

phrases.pCn: 慢行通过的空间；供电线或水管等通过的槽隙

remMethod.val: c + raw(生疏的) + l → 对地形生疏， 车要开得慢一点 → 缓慢行进

trans.tranOther: to move along on your hands and knees with your body close to the ground
a way of swimming in which you lie on your stomach and move one arm, and then the other, over your head
